name: Acacia Honey
description: Light and delicate with a mild floral taste. Perfect for tea and desserts.

name: Herbal Honey
description: Rich in flavor with herbal undertones. Great for medicinal purposes.

name: Linden Honey
description: Sweet with a woody aroma. Excellent for soothing sore throats.

name: Wildflower Honey
description: Complex flavor profile that changes with the seasons. A true taste of nature.

name: Rapeseed Honey
description: Creamy texture with a mild taste. Perfect for spreading on bread.
